Description:
Microsoft has decided not to proceed with the Prioritize policy matches using Azure Cognitive Services sentiment analysis.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: June CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Prioritize analysis of policy-driven alerts with Azure Cognitive Services (U.S. Government clouds)
